author: gnosticdev
description: A Bun plugin for generating typescript types for environment variables
name: bun-plugin-env-types

scripts.tag: git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.publish:patch: npm version --allow-same-version patch && npm run build && npm publish  && npm run tag
scripts.publish:minor: npm version --allow-same-version minor && npm run build && npm publish && npm run tag --allow-same-version
scripts.publish:major: npm version --allow-same-version major && npm run build && npm publish && npm run tag --allow-same-version
